typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	parameter1 as string
}
source(output(
		ID_CITY as string,
		NO_COUNTRY as string,
		NO_CITY as string,
		SALES as string,
		DT_UPDATE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> australiacities2
australiacities2 derive(LOAD_DATETIME = $parameter1) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
